pages.text: So-called "Uma Musume", is a group of girls who were born to run.$(p)They have inherited names from another world - some of their original owners have been ill-fated, some have shone for generations ......$(p)They inherit their souls and continue to run ......$(p)The way it was supposed to be.
These now refer more to the souls that are lodged in the marvelous crystals. This "Crystallization of the soul" is the so-called "Umamusume Soul".

Place the jewel or "Uma Ticket", After a burst of change will gets "Faded Umamusume Soul". $(br)These dull colored crystals don't work at all. $(br2)Offering these dull crystals directly to the statue of the Goddess will cause the crystals to glow again with the gift of the Three Goddesses.

After transform to "Uma Musume", By default the current motivations and selected skill are displayed in the bottom right corner of the HUD. $(br2) There is a blue bar on the right side of the HUD representing the current Action Pt, which is not shown by default if Action Pt has been fully restored.
